alert.note: Alert for Baker; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Union (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 7:18PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Baker, Union and east central Columbia Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 718 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Taylor to near Lulu. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Butler, Worthington Spring, Taylor, Macclenny, Glen St. Mary, Worthington Springs, Palestine Community, Groves, Providence and Olustee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Union
